name: Crystal seeker (Hazel Mesh)
description:
Instructions:

Be sure you enter fullscreen mode for best experience.

[WASD] - Move       [Arrow keys] - Rotate camera

[Space] - Jump , hold space for larger jump

[P] - Pause/unpause game

Collect all power crystals (9) to beat the game.

Replay levels in time trial to get time crystals.

Features:

  • Fully functional 3D platformer physics
  • 9 levels & 3 unique world styles (grassland, ice, jungle)
  • 7 OST (original sound tracks)
  • Many features like moving, slippery, falling platforms, swinging ropes, bouncing pads, boosting circles and more…
  • 3 types of enemies
  • 3 full boss fights
  • Time trial version of levels
  • Mobile friendly controls

This game is made in scratch
